means: 一起工作的人，同事，工友

sentence.Network_en: You'll see. I'd like to propose a toast to our new workmate.
sentence.Network_cn: 你马上会明白. 我想要大家为我们的新工友敬一杯酒.

sentence.Network_en: B : I went out for drinks with my workmate Susan.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和同事苏珊一起出去喝了几杯.

sentence.Network_en: A workmate says to Dave: " Are you all right, Dave? "
sentence.Network_cn: 一位同事问他: “ 你好吗, 戴夫? ”

考研单词 - 豆丁网 ... playmate n. 玩耍朋友， 游伴 workmate n. 同事， 工作伙伴 roommate n. 同屋者, 室友.

list.abs: two of his workmates recommended him for party membership .他的两个同事介绍他入党了。
We are not only good workmate but also good friends !, 我们不仅仅是好同事也是好朋友!
His workmates were looking at him and whispering ., 他的伙伴们正看着他并且在嘀咕着什么.
workmate 2 : that's what I'm trying to tell you .工友2:这就是我要告诉你的.

entry.def: Your workmates are the people you work with.

example.ex: My workmates, and, even more, the management, didn't want me to leave.
example.tran: 我的同事，甚至包括管理层都不想让我离开。

auth_sentence.content: My workmate had grassed me up and all my pictures were over Facebook.
auth_sentence.res_content: My workmate had grassed me up and all my pictures were over Facebook.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My workmate had grassed me up and all my pictures were over Facebook.

means.word_mean: 一起工作的人;同事;工友

sentences.en: He had a set-to with one of his workmates.
sentences.cn: 他和一位工友干了一架。

sentences.en: His workmates made a collection for his leaving party.
sentences.cn: 他的同事为他的告别晚会募捐。

sentences.en: He has kept up with a number of his old workmates since his retirement.
sentences.cn: 他退休以后一直和许多老同事保持着联系。
